CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this checkbox field to indicate the applicant has declined to provide their ethnicity and the loan officer has collected ethnicity information on the basis of visual observation or surname. By default, this field is deselected.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__HMDA_Ethnicity_Collection_Method__c, '1'), IF( OR( INCLUDES(LLC_BI__HMDA_Ethnicity__c,'1'), INCLUDES(LLC_BI__HMDA_Ethnicity__c,'2'), INCLUDES(LLC_BI__HMDA_Ethnicity__c,'11'), INCLUDES(LLC_BI__HMDA_Ethnicity__c,'12'), INCLUDES(LLC_BI__HMDA_Ethnicity__c,'13'), INCLUDES(LLC_BI__HMDA_Ethnicity__c,'14') ), true, false), false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates that the applicant declined to provide their ethnicity, but the loan officer collected this information on the basis of visual observation or surname.
CustomField.label: Is Ethnicity Collected Visually
